com.jme3.bullet.collision

Class PhysicsCollisionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.NativePhysicsObject
      • com.jme3.bullet.collision.PhysicsCollisionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<NativePhysicsObject>

    public class PhysicsCollisionEvent
extends NativePhysicsObject
    Describe a collision between 2 objects in a CollisionSpace, based on Bullet's btManifoldPoint.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhysicsCollisionEvent

        public PhysicsCollisionEvent(PhysicsCollisionObject pcoA,
                             PhysicsCollisionObject pcoB,
                             long manifoldPointId)
        Instantiate a collision event.
        Parameters:
        pcoA - the first involved object (not null, alias created)
        pcoB - the 2nd involved object (not null, alias created)
        manifoldPointId - the native ID of the btManifoldPoint (not 0)

      • getAppliedImpulse

        public float getAppliedImpulse()
        Read the collision's applied impulse (native field: m_appliedImpulse).
        Returns:
        impulse calculated during the previous timestep, or zero if the WarmStart bit is cleared in the solver mode

      • getDistance1

        public float getDistance1()
        Read the collision's separation distance (native field: m_distance1). This is the negative of the penetration depth.
        Returns:
        the distance (in physics-space units)

      • getFlags

        public int getFlags()
        Read the contact-point flags (native field: m_contactPointFlags).
        Returns:
        a bitmask

      • getIndex0

        public int getIndex0()
        Read the triangle index from the shape of collision object A at the point of contact (native field: m_index0).

        If shape is convex, the index is undefined.

        If shape is a CompoundCollisionShape, the index identifies a child shape.

        If the shape is a GImpactCollisionShape or MeshCollisionShape, the index identifies a triangle in an IndexedMesh.

        If the shape is a HeightfieldCollisionShape, the index indicates a grid column.

        Returns:
        the index of the collision-shape triangle (≥0) or -1 if undefined

      • getIndex1

        public int getIndex1()
        Read the triangle index from the shape of collision object B at the point of contact (native field: m_index1).

        If shape is convex, the index is undefined.

        If shape is a CompoundCollisionShape, the index identifies a child shape.

        If the shape is a GImpactCollisionShape or MeshCollisionShape, the index identifies a triangle in an IndexedMesh.

        If the shape is a HeightfieldCollisionShape, the index indicates a grid column.

        Returns:
        the index of the collision-shape triangle (≥0) or -1 if undefined

      • getLateralFrictionDir1

        public com.jme3.math.Vector3f getLateralFrictionDir1(com.jme3.math.Vector3f storeResult)
        Copy the collision's lateral friction direction #1 (native field: m_lateralFrictionDir1).
        Parameters:
        storeResult - storage for the result (modified if not null)
        Returns:
        a direction vector (either storeResult or a new instance)

        Returns:

      • getPartId0

        public int getPartId0()
        Read the part index from the shape of collision object A at the point of contact (native field: m_partId0).

        If the shape is compound or convex, the index is undefined.

        If the shape is a GImpactCollisionShape or MeshCollisionShape, the index identifies an IndexedMesh.

        If the shape is a HeightfieldCollisionShape, the index identifies a grid row.

        Returns:
        the index of the collision-shape part (≥0) or -1 if undefined

      • getPartId1

        public int getPartId1()
        Read the part index from the shape of collision object B at the point of contact (native field: m_partId1).

        If the shape is compound or convex, the index is undefined.

        If the shape is a GImpactCollisionShape or MeshCollisionShape, the index identifies an IndexedMesh.

        If the shape is a HeightfieldCollisionShape, the index identifies a grid row.

        Returns:
        the index of the collision-shape part (≥0) or -1 if undefined

      • isLateralFrictionInitialized

        public boolean isLateralFrictionInitialized()
        Test whether the collision's lateral friction is initialized.
        Returns:
        true if initialized, otherwise false

      • setContactCalcArea3Points

        public static void setContactCalcArea3Points(boolean setting)
        Alter how many points should be used to calculate the area of the convex hull of a contact point.
        Parameters:
        setting - true→use 3 points (faster), false→use 4 points (more accurate) (default=true)
